sources.title: Web of Evidence
sources.description: Title: Web of Evidence Summary: A British-American returns to Britain after 20 years to discover that his father has been jailed since WW2 for a murder that took place in murky circumstances. Directed by: Jack Cardiff Actors: Van Johnson, Vera Miles, Emlyn Williams Production Company: Georgefield Productions Release Date: 18 October 1959 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Twenty years after being evacuated to America, Paul Mathry returns to Liverpool for a short visit. He is shocked to find that his father, whom he believed had died a war hero, is in fact in jail for a murder committed at the time Paul left. Starting to piece those events together, he comes to suspect his father may be innocent.

metadata.Plot: Twenty years after being evacuated to America, Paul Mathry returns to Liverpool for a short visit. He is shocked to find that his father, whom he believed had died a war hero, is in fact in jail for a murder committed at the time Paul left. Starting to piece those events together, he comes to suspect his father may be innocent.
metadata.Writer: A.J. Cronin, Ken Taylor, Kenneth Hyde
metadata.Actors: Van Johnson, Vera Miles, Emlyn Williams
